quote: Eating is really one of your indoor sports. You play three times a day, and it's well worth while to make the game as pleasant as possible.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Food is fuel. But food is also comfort, culture, connection, history, tradition, art. It is life itself.
author: E.B. White

quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: If the divine creator has taken pains to give us delicious and exquisite things to eat, the least we can do is prepare them well and serve them with ceremony.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Life is uncertain. Eat dessert first.
author: Ernestine Ulric

quote: Food is symbolic of love when when shares it with another person.
author: Gavin Kaysen

quote: A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand.
author: Barbara Johnson

quote: Cooking is like love. It requires instinct and a little bit of madness.
author: Jasmin Khan

quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
author: Hippocrates

quote: We may break bread together but we tear each other apart.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food.
author: Paul Prudhomme

quote: It's amazing how pervasive food is. Every second commercial is for food. Every second TV episode takes place around a meal. In the city, you can't go ten feet without seeing or smelling a restaurant. There are 20 foot high hamburgers up on billboards. I am acutely aware of food, and its omnipresence is astounding.
author: Adam Scott

quote: The only thing better than eating good food is sharing it with good friends.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Food for the soul nourishes the body.
author: Indian Proverb

quote: Good food is like good music, it brings people together.
author: Ray Charles

quote: Life is short and there's no time for bad food.
author: Marie Antoinette

quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You can't buy happiness, but you can buy chocolate. And that's kind of the same thing.
author: Anonymous

quote: Fat people, it is commonly held, should be punished because they offend our aesthetic sensibilities. They take up too much space on subways, buses, airplanes, and elevators. They consume more than they contribute to society. They become ill and need to be taken care of, or they die early and their families are left unsupported. The only way fat people can gain some acceptance and forgiveness for their crime of overeating is to at least try, or look like they are trying, to lose weight. They must never eat an ice cream cone in public, never be seen eating a normal sized portion of non-diet food!
author: Calvin Trillin

quote: Cheese is milk's leap to immortality.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: We all have a belly; earth has its belly too; to nourish both is the soul of life.
author: Native American Proverb

quote: The quickest way to a man's heart is through his stomach.
author: Mae West

quote: My ability to tolerate shame, to compartmentalize it, to swallow it, increased right along with my belt size. it came with the territory of being heavy. Obese people have a lifetime of experience with shame.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: One good thing about food is that it tastes even better when you're sharing it with someone you love.
author: Les Dawson

quote: Soup is a hug in a bowl.
author: Anna Wintour

quote: Laughter is the best medicine, but chocolate is a close second.
author: Anonymous

quote: All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast.
author: John Gunther
